Updated .coditect/commands/export-dedup.md with 201 additions and 12     removals
         1    Run automated export and deduplication workflow to prevent 
             data loss before compaction.
         2    
         3 -  **⚠️ IMPORTANT: Run `/export` FIRST, then this command!**
         3 +  **✨ NEW: Fully automated with auto-archive!**
         4    
         5 +  ## Quick Start (Fully Automated)
         6 +  
         7 +  ```bash
         8 +  # After running /export, use automated mode:
         9 +  python3 .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py --yes 
           + --description "Your description" --auto-compact
        10 +  
        11 +  # Or let it auto-generate description:
        12 +  python3 .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py -y --auto-compact
        13 +  ```
        14 +  
        15    ## Workflow
        16    
        17    ```
        18    1. YOU run: /export
        19       ↓
        20 -  2. Run: /export-dedup
        20 +  2. Run: /export-dedup (with --yes for automation)
        21       ↓
        22 -  3. Script processes latest export
        22 +  3. Script finds ALL export files (root + MEMORY-CONTEXT)
        23       ↓
        24 -  4. Deduplicates messages
        24 +  4. Deduplicates messages (SHA-256 hashing)
        25       ↓
        26 -  5. Creates checkpoint + git commit
        26 +  5. Archives exports to MEMORY-CONTEXT/exports-archive
        27       ↓
        28 -  6. YOU run: /compact (when prompted)
        28 +  6. Creates checkpoint + git commit
        29 +     ↓
        30 +  7. YOU run: /compact (when prompted)
        31    ```
        32    
        33    ## Why This Prevents Data Loss
        34    
        35    - `/export` captures FULL conversation (before compaction)
        36 -  - Deduplication extracts unique messages
        36 +  - Script finds exports in root AND MEMORY-CONTEXT 
           + directories
        37 +  - Deduplication extracts unique messages with SHA-256 
           + hashing
        38 +  - Exports automatically archived (keeps workspace clean)
        39    - Checkpoint preserves everything in git
        40    - `/compact` can safely free space (data already saved!)
        41    
        42 +  ## New Features
        43 +  
        44 +  ### ✅ Automated Mode (`--yes` / `-y`)
        45 +  - No interactive prompts (perfect for scripts/automation)
        46 +  - Auto-accepts old exports (still processes them)
        47 +  - Auto-generates checkpoint description if not provided
        48 +  
        49 +  ### ✅ Auto-Archive
        50 +  - Moves processed exports to 
           + `MEMORY-CONTEXT/exports-archive/`
        51 +  - Keeps workspace root clean
        52 +  - Prevents re-processing same exports
        53 +  - Can disable with `--no-archive`
        54 +  
        55 +  ### ✅ Multi-Location Search
        56 +  - Searches repo root for `*EXPORT*.txt`
        57 +  - Searches `MEMORY-CONTEXT/` for `*EXPORT*.txt`
        58 +  - Processes all found exports (not just latest)
        59 +  - Removes duplicates automatically
        60 +  
        61 +  ### ✅ Better Error Handling
        62 +  - Catches `EOFError` in non-interactive environments
        63 +  - Shows full traceback on failures
        64 +  - Continues on archive failures (doesn't abort)
        65 +  
        66    ## Arguments
        67    
        68 -  Pass arguments after the command:
        68 +  All arguments are optional:
        69    
        70 -  - `--description "Your description"` - Checkpoint 
           -  description
        71 -  - `--checkpoint-only` - Skip deduplication
        72 -  - `--auto-compact` - Show compact reminder
        70 +  - `--description "Your description"` - Checkpoint 
           +  description (auto-generated if not provided)
        71 +  - `--checkpoint-only` - Skip deduplication
           +  , just create checkpoint
        72 +  - `--auto-compact` - Show compact reminder after completion
        73 +  - `-y` / `--yes` - Skip all interactive prompts (automation
           +  mode)
        74 +  - `--no-archive` - Don't move exports to archive (keep in 
           + place)
        75    
        76 -  Execute the Python script:
        76 +  ## Usage Examples
        77    
        78 +  ### Interactive Mode (Original Behavior)
        79    ```python
        80    import subprocess
        81    subprocess.run(["python3", 
             ".coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py", "--auto-compact"])
        82 +  # Will prompt for confirmation if export is old
        83 +  # Will prompt for checkpoint description
        84    ```
        85 +  
        86 +  ### Automated Mode (New)
        87 +  ```python
        88 +  import subprocess
        89 +  subprocess.run([
        90 +      "python3", ".coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py",
        91 +      "--yes",  # Skip all prompts
        92 +      "--description", "Project Intelligence Platform 
           + submodule created",
        93 +      "--auto-compact"
        94 +  ])
        95 +  # Fully automated, no prompts, archives exports
        96 +  ```
        97 +  
        98 +  ### Minimal Automation
        99 +  ```python
       100 +  import subprocess
       101 +  subprocess.run([
       102 +      "python3", ".coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py",
       103 +      "-y"  # Just auto-accept, use default description
       104 +  ])
       105 +  # Auto-description: "Automated export and deduplication"
       106 +  ```
       107 +  
       108 +  ### Skip Archive (Keep Exports)
       109 +  ```python
       110 +  import subprocess
       111 +  subprocess.run([
       112 +      "python3", ".coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py",
       113 +      "--yes",
       114 +      "--no-archive"  # Don't move exports
       115 +  ])
       116 +  # Processes exports but leaves them in place
       117 +  ```
       118 +  
       119 +  ## Output Example
       120 +  
       121 +  ```
       122 +  
           + ============================================================
       123 +  CODITECT Export & Deduplicate Workflow
       124 +  
           + ============================================================
       125 +  
       126 +  Step 1: Looking for export files...
       127 +  ✓ Found 2 export file(s)
       128 +    Latest: 2025-11-18-EXPORT-PROJECTS-coditect-rollout-maste
           + r-coditect-project-intelligenc.txt
       129 +  ✓ Recent export (< 5 min old)
       130 +  
       131 +  Step 2: Deduplicating messages...
       132 +  
       133 +    Deduplication Results:
       134 +      Total messages: 54
       135 +      New unique: 54
       136 +      Duplicates filtered: 0
       137 +      Dedup rate: 0.0%
       138 +      Global unique count: 1655
       139 +  
       140 +  Step 3: Archiving export files...
       141 +    ✓ Archived: 2025-11-18-EXPORT-PROJECTS-coditect-rollout-m
           + aster-coditect-project-intelligenc.txt → 
           + MEMORY-CONTEXT/exports-archive/...
       142 +    ✓ Archived: 2025-11-17-EXPORT-PROJECTS-coditect-rollout-m
           + aster-2117ET.txt → MEMORY-CONTEXT/exports-archive/...
       143 +  
       144 +    Total archived: 2 file(s)
       145 +  
       146 +  Step 4: Creating checkpoint...
       147 +  ✓ Checkpoint created successfully
       148 +  
       149 +  
           + ============================================================
       150 +  ✅ Export and deduplication complete!
       151 +  
           + ============================================================
       152 +  
       153 +  📊 Deduplication Summary:
       154 +     - New unique messages: 54
       155 +     - Total unique messages: 1655
       156 +     - Storage: MEMORY-CONTEXT/dedup_state
       157 +  
       158 +  📁 Export(s) archived:
       159 +     - Location: MEMORY-CONTEXT/exports-archive
       160 +     - Files: 2 export(s) moved
       161 +  
       162 +  📝 Checkpoint created: Project Intelligence Platform 
           + submodule created
       163 +  
       164 +  
           + ⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️
       165 +  
       166 +  💡 Safe to compact now!
       167 +  
       168 +     Run: /compact
       169 +  
       170 +     This will free up context space while
       171 +     preserving all data in the checkpoint.
       172 +  
       173 +  
           + ⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️
       174 +  ```
       175 +  
       176 +  ## Archive Directory Structure
       177 +  
       178 +  After running:
       179 +  ```
       180 +  MEMORY-CONTEXT/
       181 +  ├── exports-archive/          # New: Auto-created archive
       182 +  │   ├── 2025-11-18-EXPORT-PROJECTS-coditect-rollout-master-
           + coditect-project-intelligenc.txt
       183 +  │   ├── 2025-11-17-EXPORT-PROJECTS-coditect-rollout-master-
           + 2117ET.txt
       184 +  │   └── ...
       185 +  ├── dedup_state/              # Deduplication state
       186 +  │   ├── unique_messages.jsonl (1655 messages)
       187 +  │   ├── checkpoint_index.json
       188 +  │   └── global_hashes.json
       189 +  └── sessions/                 # Session exports
       190 +  ```
       191 +  
       192 +  ## Best Practices
       193 +  
       194 +  1. **Always run `/export` first** - Captures current 
           + conversation state
       195 +  2. **Use `--yes` for automation** - No interactive prompts 
           + needed
       196 +  3. **Add `--description`** - Makes checkpoints easier to 
           + find later
       197 +  4. **Use `--auto-compact`** - Reminds you to free up 
           + context
       198 +  5. **Check archive periodically** - Old exports can be 
           + deleted manually
       199 +  
       200 +  ## Integration with Other Commands
       201 +  
       202 +  ```bash
       203 +  # Complete workflow (automated):
       204 +  /export
       205 +  python3 .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py -y --description 
           + "Feature X complete" --auto-compact
       206 +  /compact
       207 +  
       208 +  # Or use the slash command wrapper:
       209 +  /export
       210 +  /export-dedup  # Calls script automatically
       211 +  /compact
       212 +  ```
       213 +  
       214 +  ## Troubleshooting
       215 +  
       216 +  **"No export files found!"**
       217 +  - Run `/export` first to create an export file
       218 +  
       219 +  **"Deduplication failed"**
       220 +  - Check that `MEMORY-CONTEXT/dedup_state/` exists
       221 +  - Check for corrupt JSON files in dedup_state/
       222 +  - Script shows full traceback for debugging
       223 +  
       224 +  **"Archive failed"**
       225 +  - Check write permissions on `MEMORY-CONTEXT/`
       226 +  - Script continues even if archive fails (non-fatal)
       227 +  
       228 +  **Export is old but script continues**
       229 +  - Using `--yes` flag auto-accepts old exports
       230 +  - Remove `--yes` to get prompted for confirmation

messages.content:
✅ Export-Dedup Script Fixed and Enhanced!

  What Was Fixed

  ❌ Original Problems

  1. EOFError in non-interactive mode - Script crashed when trying to read
  input in automated environments
  2. Only searched MEMORY-CONTEXT - Missed export files in repo root
  directory
  3. No automatic archiving - Processed exports cluttered workspace
  4. No automation support - Always required human interaction

  ✅ New Features Implemented

  1. Fully Automated Mode (--yes / -y flag)

  python3 .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py -y --description "Session 
  complete" --auto-compact
  - No interactive prompts - Perfect for CI/CD and automation
  - Auto-accepts old exports - Still processes them without prompting
  - Auto-generates descriptions - Uses default if not provided
  - EOFError-safe - Catches and handles non-interactive environments

  2. Automatic Export Archiving

  # Archives to: MEMORY-CONTEXT/exports-archive/
  - Moves processed exports - Keeps workspace root clean
  - Prevents re-processing - Duplicate detection via file location
  - Can disable - Use --no-archive flag to keep exports in place
  - Timestamp collision handling - Auto-adds timestamp if archive file
  exists

  3. Multi-Location Search

  # Searches both:
  # - /repo/root/*EXPORT*.txt
  # - /repo/root/MEMORY-CONTEXT/*EXPORT*.txt
  - Finds ALL exports - Not just in MEMORY-CONTEXT
  - Processes all found - Not just the latest one
  - Removes duplicates - Dedup by file path
  - Sorted by time - Most recent processed first

  4. Better Error Handling

  try:
      response = input("\nContinue anyway? (y/n): ")
  except (EOFError, KeyboardInterrupt):
      print("\n⚠️  Non-interactive mode detected, continuing anyway...")
  - Catches EOFError - Handles non-interactive environments
  - Full tracebacks - Shows complete error details for debugging
  - Non-fatal archive errors - Continues if archiving fails
  - Clear error messages - Helps troubleshoot issues

  Script Improvements Summary

  | Feature             | Before              | After
    |
  |---------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------
  --|
  | Interactive Prompts | Always prompted     | Optional with -y flag
    |
  | Search Locations    | MEMORY-CONTEXT only | Root + MEMORY-CONTEXT
    |
  | Export Archiving    | Manual              | Automatic to
  exports-archive/ |
  | Error Handling      | Crashes on EOFError | Catches and continues
    |
  | Automation Support  | ❌ No                | ✅ Full automation
      |
  | CI/CD Compatible    | ❌ No                | ✅ Yes
      |

  New Arguments

  --description "Your description"  # Checkpoint description (auto-gen if 
  omitted)
  --checkpoint-only                 # Skip deduplication
  --auto-compact                    # Show compact reminder
  -y / --yes                        # Skip all interactive prompts ⭐ NEW
  --no-archive                      # Don't move exports to archive ⭐ NEW

  Usage Examples

  Fully Automated (New):
  # After /export, run:
  python3 .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py -y --description "Feature 
  complete" --auto-compact

  # Minimal (auto-description):
  python3 .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py -y --auto-compact

  Interactive (Original):
  python3 .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py --auto-compact
  # Prompts for confirmation if export is old
  # Prompts for checkpoint description

  Testing (Keep exports):
  python3 .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py --yes --no-archive
  # Processes but doesn't move exports

  Test Results

  ✅ Successfully tested automated mode:
  ============================================================
  CODITECT Export & Deduplicate Workflow
  ============================================================

  Step 1: Looking for export files...
  ✓ Found 2 export file(s)
    Latest: 2025-11-15T22:34:28-EXPORT-MEMORY-CONTEXT.MASTER-PROJECT.txt
  ⚠️  Latest export is 3354.3 minutes old (auto-accepting)

  Step 2: Deduplicating messages...
    Deduplication Results:
      Total messages: 226
      New unique: 0
      Duplicates filtered: 226
      Dedup rate: 100.0%
      Global unique count: 203

  Step 3: Archiving export files...
    ✓ Archived: 2025-11-15T22:34:28-EXPORT-MEMORY-CONTEXT.MASTER-PROJECT.txt
    ✓ Archived: 2025-11-16-EXPORT-CONTEXT-AZ1.AI-CODITECT-QUICKSTART.txt
    Total archived: 2 file(s)

  Step 4: Creating checkpoint...
  ✓ Checkpoint created successfully

  ✅ Export and deduplication complete!

  Git Commits

  Framework Repository (.coditect/):
  cbeecdf Enhanced export-dedup script with full automation

  Master Repository:
  ba565aa Update framework submodule: Enhanced export-dedup automation

  Documentation Updated

  ✅ commands/export-dedup.md - Complete rewrite with:
  - Quick start guide for automation
  - New features documented
  - Usage examples (interactive vs automated)
  - Output examples
  - Archive directory structure
  - Best practices
  - Troubleshooting section

  Next Steps

  To use the improved script:
  # 1. Run /export to capture conversation
  /export

  # 2. Run automated deduplication with archiving
  python3 .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py -y --description "Your session 
  name" --auto-compact

  # 3. Run /compact to free up context
  /compact

  ---
  Status: ✅ SCRIPT FIXED AND ENHANCED
  - No more EOFError crashes in non-interactive mode
  - Automatic export archiving keeps workspace clean
  - Multi-location search finds all exports
  - Full automation support for CI/CD
  - Complete documentation with examples
  - Tested and verified working

  The /export-dedup script is now fully automated and production-ready! 🚀
